item.title: Gully drain cover o/s 22 and 42 Stephen Road, 11th December
item.description:
The gully drains were cleaned out on Monday and the drain covers have not been put back properly. The one os 42 is raised up by the pavement and is dangerous. Please can this be looked into with a matter of urgency.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stephen Road, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Someone has been letting their dog poo on the street of Westbury road se20 7ql, 11th December
item.description:
This has been going on for months. A local witness reported seeing a few young people with a large dog watching their dog foul on the street and then walking away. This is frequently outside 10-14 Westbury Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westbury Road, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Stuck open gate obstructing pavement, 11th December
item.description:
The gates to the car park of this block of flats have failed. One gate has been fixed open across the pavement, making it more difficult for people with mobility issues to get past. It is forcing them too close to the end of the dropped kerb thus increasing the chance of stumbling.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidney Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
